name: QrPngModuleJitterOptions
summary: Options for per-module jitter offsets (organic placement).

properties.name: Seed
properties.summary: Random seed used to offset modules.

properties.name: ApplyToEyes
properties.summary: When true, applies jitter to eye modules.

properties.name: ProtectFunctionalPatterns
properties.summary: When true, functional patterns keep their original alignment.

properties.name: ClampToShape
properties.summary: When true, limits jitter to stay inside the module cell.
